title: Add "French" on Oceanic server
body:
Hello Riot !
Sorry for my bad english, usually I speak french (maybe because I'm French).
I live in New-Caledonia, an french island near Australia. So, as you know, we can only choose "English" for this server, but ... They are not only english people ahah. Usually english people are a bit made when we speak french in a game, because they don't know that they are also french people in the server. So, I would like to know if it's possible to add "French" for the server ?
I know it's juste a detail, but please, do it, we are here too ahah.
Thank's for reading guys !

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is definitely possible to do on your own, all you have to do is follow the steps outlined below.

Open the file **regions.txt** located in Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_patcher\managedfiles\0.0.0.48 and edit it to look like the image below.

http://puu.sh/nKlnL/fe289c8cf6.png

Save the file and re-open your launcher, you should then be able to select your desired language by clicking the arrow in the top right of the launcher, going to language and selecting French.

http://puu.sh/nKlsW/6cda258be7.png
http://puu.sh/nKlvi/d2f22edfd6.jpg

Oooooooooooookay thank you !
I'll try, even if it stay unofficial :/
But thank you again ^^
